explanation: [0-0] A hand is holding a blue balloon with a cute face drawn on it. Below the balloon is a transparent oval container.

[0-7] Another hand takes out a pair of pink scissors and cuts off the top of the balloon. Some white beads spray out from the top of the balloon, some falling into the container and some scattering outside. Some deflated balloons are also wrapped inside. The hand then tries to squeeze the balloon but finds it impossible to squeeze out. Afterward, the scissors cut the balloon open, and the white beads fall out. Then the hand pours all the remaining beads inside into the container.
